title: realpseudozach
author: realpseudozach
content: You can use https://sms4sats.com to receive sms activation codes from 400+ services and 100+ countries.We source 1-time use disposable phone numbers from multiple providers and make it available without any accounts. * Select country (optional) - leave at auto-select and we'll choose the country to give you the highest chance of successful verification.* Select service - twitter, discord, telegram etc.* Pay the Lightning Network invoice* You'll get a phone number, enter into service.* Verification code will show-up on the screen as soon as service sends it.That's it! You can finish your activation under 30 seconds.You can also send SMS and rent phone numbers for 4 hours to receive multiple SMS messages.We also offer a tor hidden service: http://sms4sat6y7lkq4vscloomatwyj33cfeddukkvujo2hkdqtmyi465spid.onionAPI for other Bitcoin/Lightning companies to send SMS programmatically: https://docs.sms4sats.com. Some companies like lnvpn and lightsats are already using it.One cool thing we did is to use "hold invoices" and only settle the payment once code is received from the service and shown to the user, this way you only pay if it actually works for you. Otherwise funds return to your lightning wallet automatically!note: We accept only Bitcoin on Lightning network. If you want to pay with onchain btc you can use muun wallet or many swap services like deezy.io or boltz.exchange.
